QuestData.Title: Culling the Coven
QuestData.Description:
If the mine really was their objective, I can only imagine they'd have even more forces in there.
My men and I may be able to take care of the remnants out here, but if an even bigger force comes out of that mine, we're not going to stand a chance.
While you're hunting down the matron with this wicker contraption, do you think you could... you know... soften them up a bit?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa of Matron Levae's minions in the Elderstone Mine.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you go into the mines? What was it like in there?
QuestData.RewardText:
Wait... you're telling me it was even worse in the mines?
You know what? Just don't tell me about it. So long as you killed... whatever was in there... I think we'll be okay.
